EmailTemplate.name: FS RECEIPT- email after posting
EmailTemplate.subject: Order Confirmation & Receipt
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!OrderApi__Receipt__c.OrderApi__Contact__c},
Thank you for your order.
In order to access an On-Demand program, you must Log-in, click on My Learning Dashboard, and launch the recorded program from the list.
Downloadable purchases, such as eBooks, can be accessed by selecting the My Downloads tab when viewing your profile.
For products being shipped, due to the current situation being presented to us with the Coronavirus, our warehouse is operating on reduced hours, so please allow 7-10 business days for your order to arrive.
Please follow the link below to download a copy of your receipt.
Receipt Link: https://portal.nysba.org/Orderapi__receipt?id={!OrderApi__Receipt__c.Id}
If you have any questions regarding your receipt, please contact our Member Resource Center at 800-582-2452 or via e-mail mrc@nysba.org
Thank you, The {!Organization.Name}
One Elk Street Albany NY 12207 518-463-3200
www.nysba.org
